Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.WinObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
public class Board extends WinObservable
This class represents the Board with the islands inside Knows where's MotherNature and knows the strategies to calculate the influences
